description:
iThemes is a collection of ios18 control center widgets, lock screen widgets, popular wallpapers and other functions in one of the utility products. We are committed to providing users with functional conditions that make it easy to add beautiful and practical widgets to the home screen and lock screen, a huge amount of resources that make it easy to select the content you like, and customized scenarios that allow you to freely edit the content you want.

iThemes has a large number of designer customized creative widgets, and also supports you to design your own  widgets using the widget custom editor. iThemes not only provides a rich library of interesting widgets, but also prepares a large number of popular wallpapers and other interesting, beautiful, diversified and wonderful content for you to show off your own hobby and aesthetics to provide a broad platform space. Highly customizable widgets allow you to completely personalize your screen. iThemes will be your best partner in transforming your device.

● Super rich widget library
Each widget can be freely customized by replacing photos, selecting styles, editing fonts, and other unique custom design options. The widgets we provide include but are not limited to:
● iOS18 Control Center Widget
● Lock Screen Widget
● Practical Photo Widget
● Date and Time Widget
● Battery Widget
● Weather Widget
● Calendar Widget
● Custom Text/Quote Widget
......There are many more resources updated in real time for you to choose from~

● Massive Wallpaper Resources
We provide users with the most popular wallpaper resources to make your phone always wonderful, updated in real time, with a wide variety to meet your imagination of wallpapers.


● Super exquisite theme packages
We integrate global designer and artist resources to provide users with super exquisite massive theme packages, which perfectly integrate widgets, icon packs, and wallpapers, while highlighting the practical value of widgets, while retaining the unique beauty and aesthetic value of each widget. It only takes a few steps to set up the entire theme and decorate your phone interface with one click. In addition, we continue to update and release new themes to meet the diverse needs of users.We provide users with the most popular wallpaper resources, so that your phone is always wonderful, real-time updates, a variety of categories, to meet your imagination of wallpaper.

More exciting look forward to your discovery!

Unwanted stuff ruining your shot? No worries! Object Remover can vanish people, pimples, buildings, lines - you name it, we remove it!

- Remove unwanted people
- Remove acne
- Remove building
- Remove lines
- Remove background
- Remove anything you want to remove!

Unwanted stuff ruining your perfect shot? No worries — we've got your back! Object Remover is your go-to AI-powered photo editing tool that lets you clean up your pictures like a pro. Whether it’s unexpected people in the background, stubborn pimples, distracting buildings, unwanted lines, or even the entire background — if you can see it, you can remove it. One tap, and it’s gone!

Here’s what you can easily remove using Object Remover:

* People sneaking into your photos
* Skin imperfections like acne or pimples
* Buildings and architectural clutter
* Lines, cables, and any distracting elements
* Entire backgrounds you want to replace
* Basically... anything you want to erase!

Object Remover combines powerful AI technology with a user-friendly interface to make photo editing fast, easy, and fun. No need for expensive software or complicated tutorials — now you can achieve studio-quality results directly from your iPhone in just a few taps.

Our smart editing tools are designed to save you time and effort. With precise detection and natural-looking results, you’ll be amazed at how seamlessly objects disappear — like they were never there.

Why you’ll love Object Remover:

- Intuitive, easy-to-use tools
- Lightning-fast AI processing
- Super realistic removal results
- No editing skills required
- Perfect for selfies, travel shots, product images, and more

Whether you're enhancing your social media photos, cleaning up professional portraits, or simply experimenting with creativity, Object Remover delivers stunning edits in seconds.

You can subscribe to unlock the full power of Object Remover and access advanced AI removal features. Our premium tools are crafted to offer the most realistic, high-quality edits on the App Store.

【 Number 1 in Usability 】

Create floor plans in just 10 seconds!

Introducing the easy-to-use floor plan creation app!

【 Features 】

① Simply trace with your finger to draw walls, windows, and floors (colors)

② Freely place fixtures and furniture

③ Specify the size of walls, windows, and doors in millimeters

④ Create stylish floor plans with custom colors

⑤ Create floor plans for multiple floors (1st to 3rd floors)

⑥ Convert 2D floor plans into 3D, and more

While Madory is available for free, we also offer paid plans, Madory Pro and Madory Biz, as detailed below.

◆ Paid Plans (Monthly Subscription) ◆

◎ Madory Pro (Entry, Standard, Advance)

Entry: Removes ads, unlimited floor plan views, data/image saving features

Standard: Removes ads, unlimited floor plan views, data/image saving features, unlimited floor plan creation

Advance: Removes ads, unlimited floor plan views, data/image saving features, unlimited floor plan creation, unlimited floor plan creation features

◎ Madory Biz (Entry, Standard, Advance)

Entry: Removes ads, unlimited floor plan views, data/image saving features, unlimited floor plan creation, unlimited floor plan creation features, use across multiple devices (iPad, etc.)

Standard: Removes ads, unlimited floor plan views, data/image saving features, unlimited floor plan creation, unlimited floor plan creation features, data sharing with third parties

Advance: Removes ads, unlimited floor plan views, data/image saving features, unlimited floor plan creation, unlimited floor plan creation features, business features (My Page creation)

◆ Pricing & Subscription ◆

◎ Madory Pro (Entry, Standard, Advance)

Entry: ¥480/month

Standard: ¥980/month

Advance: ¥1,980/month

◎ Madory Biz (Entry, Standard, Advance)

Entry: ¥4,980/month

Standard: ¥9,980/month

Advance: ¥19,980/month

Prices may change.

The subscription renews automatically every month, starting from the date of purchase.

【 Payment Method 】

Charges will be billed to your iTunes account.

The subscription renews automatically each month.

【 Automatic Renewal Details 】

If you do not cancel the subscription at least 24 hours before the renewal date, the subscription will renew automatically.
Billing will occur within 24 hours before the renewal date.

【 Checking Subscription Status & Canceling (Turning Off Auto-Renewal) 】

To check your subscription status or cancel auto-renewal, follow the steps below:
(iOS 10 and earlier)

Open the App Store

Scroll to the bottom of the "Featured" tab

Select "Apple ID/Account"

Select "Manage Subscriptions"

(iOS 11 and later)

Open Settings

Select "iTunes & App Store"

Tap your Apple ID at the top

Tap "View Apple ID"

Sign in if prompted

Select "Subscriptions"

Choose "Madory"

Here, you can check the next renewal date and manage auto-renewal.

You can also check and manage your subscription in iTunes.

To cancel your subscription, turn off auto-renewal via the App Store. Subscriptions made via iTunes cannot be canceled directly from the app (including the website).

【 Cancellation for the Current Month 】

We do not accept cancellations for the current month's subscription.

【 Terms of Use / EULA 】

【 Privacy Policy 】

Mico — Your Home Screen Personalization App, fully optimized for OS 26！
Fully adapted for OS 26 — unlock customizable Animated Artwork, explore a wide range of popular 3D & Depth Effect Wallpapers, and enjoy the upgraded Liquid Glass Theme that brings a unique texture to your home screen.
【OS 26 Depth Effect Wallpaper & Liquid Glass Theme】
* Depth Effect Wallpaper：Specially optimized for OS 26, the all-new Depth Effect Wallpapers use intelligent layering and spatial design to seamlessly blend time and wallpaper elements, bringing a vivid sense of depth and personality to your screen.
* Liquid Glass Theme：Explore the artistic fusion of light and fluid textures, unlocking a fresh and unique visual experience.

【DIY Live Wallpapers & Battery Icon Wallpaper】
Supports static/dynamic wallpaper creation, with a wide range of templates like Polaroid, heart collage, flip cards, labubu live wallpaper, and more. There are also various battery icon stickers and battery widget to personalize the top status bar of your phone, making your wallpapers even more fun. Your home screen becomes a unique design that's truly your own.

【Theme Template, One-Click To Use】 
Mico's theme pack lets you mix and match stylish widgets and lock screen templates to create a home screen that's uniquely yours. Top widgets and stunning wallpapers created by designers from around the world—yours to use with just a tap. Effortlessly design your perfect home screen.

【Home & Lock Screen Widgets】 
Transform your iOS experience with customizable widgets for both Home Screen and Lock Screen!  
*Couple widget: Couple widgets let you and your partner share a little love right on your home screens. No matter how far apart you are, you’ll always feel connected.
*Battery widget: The Battery Widget not only shows your power level but also matches your home screen aesthetic with customizable styles and themes.
*Photo widget: provide a variety of styles of photo frames, cute pets, retro game consoles, movie film styles, everything 
*Animation widgets: emoticon packs, flashing emoticons, GIF, bear emoticon animations, cute cat animations, flashing hearts... 

【New iOS 18 Widgets & Themes】
Fully compatible with iOS 18 – supports customizing the control center and lock screen buttons, with plenty of cute, text, and animated icons. 

【Support Apple Health Tracking】 
Mico Lock Screen Widget integrates Apple Health App to display health data such as steps in widgets. If you want to use a super widget that contains health data, please allow the APP to access health data when entering the widget preview page.

"Unleash Your Inner Artist with DIY Wallpaper & Collage Craft! 

Tired of generic phone backgrounds? Express your unique style and stay trendy with DIY Wallpaper & Collage Craft! Your ultimate creative hub, packed with powerful tools to design stunning, personalized wallpapers. Best of all, it's FREE! 

Your phone reflects you, so we built this app for fun, easy customization. From cute aesthetics to dark vibes, cool anime to lively animals, there's something for everyone. Our mission: keep your screen fresh, trendy, and uniquely YOU! 

Dive into a World of Creativity with Our 3 Main Powerhouse Features: 

1. DIY Frame Wallpaper: Your Photos, Our Magic Frames!
Transform your photos and memories into captivating wallpapers! Our DIY Frame Wallpaper section offers a vast collection of stylish frames and templates.

- Dynamic & Static Frames: Live Frames add animations; Static Frames offer timeless elegance. Photos blend perfectly with our designs!
- Easy Photo Import: Seamlessly import any gallery image. Our tools ensure perfect fit.
- Custom Backgrounds: Experiment with colors, patterns, or textures behind your photos for the perfect mood.
stickers: Add fun, trendy stickers from our diverse library to your masterpiece!
- Collage Wallpaper Craft: 100% Freeform Creation – Your Canvas, Your Rules!
2, Unleash your imagination! Collage Wallpaper Craft gives you 100% creative freedom to design unique photo collages from scratch. No templates – just pure artistic expression. Build your vision, pixel by pixel!

- Freely Import Photos: Bring in unlimited photos! Arrange, resize, rotate, and layer them as you envision.
- Add Trendy Stickers: Access our vast, updated sticker collection. Quirky characters, aesthetic elements, memes – find the perfect sticker!

- Creative Brush Tool: Draw directly on your collage! Add unique doodles, highlights, or patterns.
- Artistic Filters: Apply stunning filters for a cohesive, professional look.
3. Curated Wallpaper Gallery: Trendy, Diverse & Always Fresh!
Beyond DIY, explore our incredible, **FREE** gallery of ready-to-use wallpapers, hand-picked and constantly updated with the hottest trends:

- Aesthetic Vibes: Dreamy pastels, minimalist designs.
- Anime Magic: Iconic characters, breathtaking scenes.
- Adorable Animals: Cute cats, majestic wildlife.

Stay trendy! We constantly update our frames, stickers, and curated wallpapers with the latest mobile culture, from TikTok aesthetics to meme crazes. And yes, it's all FREE – creativity should have no bounds or price tags!

Download DIY Wallpaper & Collage Craft now and transform your phone into a canvas of endless possibilities! Create, customize, captivate – all for FREE!

Castle is social media for creating and playing games!

- Make your own games in our simple but powerful editor, then share them with friends, or post to the community and build a following.
- Explore the millions of games, animations, and drawings made by the community. Every genre, zero ads, thousands posted every day!
- Post comments, follow your favorite creators, compete for high scores, collect achievements, or just hang out.
- Get started with our simple templates, or remix the games you see and add your own touch. Pull from a library of millions of game objects to create anything you can imagine.
- Learn to bring your ideas to life with editor tools for art, physics, logic, music, and sound. Deepen your creativity and develop skills that last forever.

Some features in Castle may require in-app purchase, such as boosting your game to reach more players. Creating and sharing games never requires in-app purchase.

Tattoo AI: Your Go-To App for Creating Unique Tattoos Effortlessly! Whether you’re a tattoo enthusiast, a first-timer considering getting inked, or a tattoo artist looking for inspiration, Tattoo AI has everything you need. With its cutting-edge AI tattoo generator and a range of styles from black & white to Japanese and tribal, you can create stunning tattoo designs for any part of your body in just a few taps.

Key Features:

AI Tattoo Generator:
Our AI tattoo generator is at the heart of Tattoo AI. Simply enter your ideas or themes, and our advanced AI will generate unique tattoo designs tailored to your preferences. It’s like having a personal tattoo artist in your pocket!

Diverse Style Options:
Tattoo AI offers a wide variety of styles to suit any taste. Whether you prefer the timeless elegance of black & white tattoos, the intricate details of Japanese art, or the bold creativity of gaming characters, you’ll find the perfect design here.

Text-Based Tattoos: Looking for a meaningful quote or phrase to ink? Tattoo AI allows you to create stunning text-based tattoos with customizable fonts and styles. Simply input your favorite words, and our AI will transform them into beautifully designed tattoos that resonate with your personality.

Full-Body Customization:
Design tattoos for any part of your body with ease. Our app allows you to visualize tattoos on various body parts, helping you see how the design will look before you commit.

High-Quality Tattoo Stencils:
Turn your designs into high-quality tattoo stencils. Perfect for tattoo artists or anyone who wants to bring their digital designs to life.

Save and Share:
Save your favorite designs and share them with friends or your tattoo artist. Get feedback, make adjustments, and finalize your perfect tattoo.

Why You’ll Love Tattoo AI:

Get Inspired:
Our AI tattoo generator gives you endless tattoo ideas. No more scrolling through generic images – get custom designs that reflect your style and personality.

Personalized Designs:
Every tattoo is unique. Tattoo AI creates personalized tattoo designs based on your inputs, making sure your tattoo is one of a kind.

Time-Saving:
Skip the hours of brainstorming and sketching. Let our AI do the heavy lifting, so you can focus on what matters – choosing and enjoying your new tattoo.

Easy Visualization:
Unsure about placement? Use our app to visualize how different designs look on different body parts. Make confident decisions about your tattoo’s size and location.

Artistic Freedom:
Whether you’re a tattoo artist or a tattoo lover, Tattoo AI provides tools that inspire creativity and allow you to explore endless possibilities.

Solve Your Tattoo Dilemmas:

Finding the perfect tattoo design can be overwhelming. Tattoo AI simplifies the process by generating designs that match your ideas and style preferences. Whether you’re looking for inspiration or a final design, our app takes the guesswork out of tattoo creation.

Unlock Your Tattoo Potential:

Tattoo AI is more than just a tattoo maker app – it’s a creative hub for tattoo enthusiasts. Our AI tattoo generator and extensive design options empower you to create tattoos that are truly yours. Whether you want a small tattoo or a full sleeve, Tattoo AI is the perfect companion for your tattoo journey.

To use this app, you must agree to our End User License Agreement (EULA), available: https://tattoo.ai/terms
To use this app, you must agree to our Privacy Policy, available at https://tattoo.ai/privacy

Fun painting app, based on Unlimited Layers with Blend Modes and Masks

Any brush can be used with 3 professional-level realtime technologies of calligraphy: Line Delay, Rope Stabilization and Correction, combine it for best results. With 100% calligraphy the line will be very smooth even if you are drawing with your finger

Brushes can be Dry, Glossy and Wet. There are 3 types of Wet brushes: Without Pull, With Pull and Super-Precise. Any brush can instantly became Smudge-brush with Finger instrument. Textured brushes are also supported

If you like to draw with simple round brush, there are quick settings for Hardness, Ovality & Rotation of your brush shape. Or, if you prefer realistic brushes, large Pro-Library of shapes (>1000 textures) can be used to create new brushes of any type

Apple Pencil is fully supported, including Touch Force, Tilt, Azimuth and Predicted Points. There are settings for each Pencil ability. You also can disable finger-painting, if you never use it

Gestures: 2-fingers tap for Undo and 3-fingers tap for Redo any action

For color choosing there are 2 different Color Pickers and Palettes with Gradient Mixer. Use long-pressure gesture for quick color choosing

Time-Lapse video recording is enabled by default


FEATURES LIST:

Create Animation:
* Unlimited frames of animation
* Multiple animation layers
* Export to mp4, hevc, gif, apng

Learn How to Draw by copying Professional Art:
* Use any Painting or Sketch as a Lesson
* Tap left side of screen to switch between your painting and the lesson
* 4 lesson types: "Equal size", "First Layer", "Horizontal split", "Vertical split"

Brushes:
* Preinstalled professional brushes
* Glossy brushes
* 50+ brush settings
* Shapes library
* Calligraphy
* Apple Pencil support
* Smudge brushes with 3 different smudge technologies
* Export-import of brushes
* Dynamic shape
* Realistic brushes
* Any brush can became a smudge brush with Smudge tool

Colors:
* 2 Color Pickers
* Color mixer
* Palettes
* Import/Export of palettes

Interface:
* Right and left handed interface
* Light or dark interface
* Custom interface color

Layers:
* Unlimited layers
* Dynamic ssd/operative memory using for layers
* Masks 
* Clear / Fill / Select / Sort / Duplicate
* Blend modes
* Opacity and visibility
* Import any image as a layer
* Transform without loosing image quality

Gestures:
* 2-Fingers tap for Undo
* 3-Fingers tap for Redo
* Long pressure for quick color choosing
* Bucket Tool: Drag the Color circle onto the canvas
* Only-gestures control with Swipes

Advanced:
* Flip canvas horizontally
* Time-Lapse video recording
* Transform instrument
* Selection tool
* PNG with transparency creation

CORE FEATURES

* AR Drawing – Project, Trace & Create:

- Use your phone or tablet camera to project any image onto real-world surfaces – paper, canvas, wall, or any workspace.
- Trace outlines directly through the screen in real time, making it perfect for learning to draw, replicating artwork, or creating complex designs.

- Instantly import photos, sketches, or designs from your photo library.

- Adjust size, rotate, zoom, and align images with your surface for an accurate drawing experience.
